---
title: "In Class Exercise 1: IS415-GAA"
author: "Jenna Cheo"

editor: visual
execute: 
  freeze: true
  eval: true
  echo: true
---

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(sf, tidyverse)
```
:::


edited 20 August: i used an absolute path instead of a relative path in this code chunk. I have replaced it.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz = st_read(dsn = "data/MPSZ-2019", 
                  layer = "MPSZ-2019")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `MPSZ-2019' from data source 
  `C:\jechaxu\IS415-GAA\In-class_Ex\data\MPSZ-2019' using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 332 features and 6 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 103.6057 ymin: 1.158699 xmax: 104.0885 ymax: 1.470775
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
```


:::
:::


The column in the sf data.frame that contains the geometries is a list. We retrieve the geometry list-column using *st_geometry()* as shown in the code chunk below.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
st_geometry(mpsz)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Geometry set for 332 features 
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 103.6057 ymin: 1.158699 xmax: 104.0885 ymax: 1.470775
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
First 5 geometries:
```

glimpse(mpsz)
